# Advanced Features

In this chapter, we explore more features of the platform.

## Offline Support

You can download books for offline reading. Once downloaded, the content is available without internet.

## Dark Mode

Switch between light and dark themes using the toggle in the header.

sections.question: TheLostChapter works offline after downloading content.
sections.correctFeedback: Correct! Downloaded content is available offline.
sections.incorrectFeedback: Not quite. Downloaded books work offline!
